description: An Apple Harvest; Claude Simpol (French, 1666 - 1716); France; about 1700; Brush and gray wash and black chalk, incised for transfer throughout (recto); Covered with red chalk for transfer, previously indented with a stylus (verso); 24.3 × 32.4 cm (9 9/16 × 12 3/4 in.); 86.GG.619; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
